short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to ignore movies in the Netflix recommendation algorithm.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to watch a movie but you didn't really want to receive recommendations of similar types of videos later? Now you don't need to use your parnter's account for this. Instead, you can use this extension. If it is enabled, all the movies that you watch won't be added to your history. Thus, they shouldn't be counted in the Netflix recommendation algorithm.

You can enable or disable the feature by clicking on the extension icon on top right corner of the browser window.
